t: For the director of music. With stringed instruments. A psalm. A song.
May*pn God be gracious to us and bless us and*ld make his face shine on usâ€”
so*ln that your ways may be known on earth, your*ld salvation among all nations.
May*pn the peoples praise you, God; may*ld all the peoples praise you.
May*ln the nations be glad and sing for joy, for*ld you rule the peoples with equity and*ld guide the nations of the earth.
May*ln the peoples praise you, God; may*ld all the peoples praise you.
The*pn land yields its harvest; God,*ld our God, blesses us.
May*ln God bless us still, so*ld that all the ends of the earth will fear him.
